forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 25C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 76F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
